page.title: 15Buxton:Employment.(cont.)
page.content: The High Peak College provides jobs : one of its most important courses is for the Catering Trade. There are a number of shops in Buxton which provide work such as Marks and Spencer, Woolworths, Boots, Co-op, and W.H.Smith. Sports shops have grown up in response to the growth in leisure. There are also accountants, banks, building societies, travel and estate agencies providing employment. The Hospitals which once used Buxton's mineral water now provide work for Buxton people.People also travel in from surrounding areas to work in such places. Perhaps it is also a reflection of Buxton's climate that there are no fewer than 30 property repairers/damp proof contractors in this small town! The most notable of the light industries is one which specialises in ladies' underwear.
